Summary: Silent, low-flying plane like object with lights
divs: Sighting DetailsThe object was lite up much like a plane, but with more lights. The lights were in a row and there was probably 6-8 of them and they were white. It was flying within 50-60 feet above the ground and no noise was herd. It was headed on a South-East trajectory, when, it made a u-turn and headed North-East until I lost sight of it in the tree line. I have NEVER seen an aircraft make such a sharp turn at such a low speed. It was probably traveling 40-60 mph. I couldnt make out the shape of this vehicle, but the lights were in a row both in the front and back.
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around January 21st 2010
